channel.title: I'd like to host my own rsc - I have web host :) - Looking for some help :)
channel.description: :palm: I'd just like to launch it tonight please anyone ? :palm:

item.title: I'd like to host my own rsc - I have web host :) - Looking for some help :)
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Schaffer, post:5, topic:548916”]Ow, I was gonna download your moparscape classic, An I don’t plan on having anyone come play on my server. Just a group of non programmers, who just want to play the game. Any tutorials on Apache ANT. Either setting up yours or lothys ?
Setup

Install the JRE and JDK
Install Ant
Install Ivy
Install MySQL
Install a Web-Server [/quote]

It’s in the help section…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Schaffer wrote:

Ow, I was gonna download your moparscape classic, An I don’t plan on having anyone come play on my server. Just a group of non programmers, who just want to play the game. Any tutorials on Apache ANT. Either setting up yours or lothys ?
Setup

Install the JRE and JDK
Install Ant
Install Ivy
Install MySQL
Install a Web-Server
